name: Modifier Mayhem
description:
You have been asleep for a long time... After constant experimentation, you have almost entirely lost your conscience. You are barely even human anymore... let me help you remember...

Modifier Mayhem is a platformer where you try to escape a lab, but every time you die, you are brought back to your test chamber and experimented on, giving you strange modifiers on your next attempt.

This is made for the Black And White Game Jam! This is my first game jam game and I think it turned out pretty good and it was very fun to develop.

Thanks to dialogic for the dialogue system, https://void1gaming.itch.io/ for the music and https://youtube.com/channel/UCfNk7fQt0H1KFQMozp-49iw for art stuff

(Also the web build is kind of buggy so keep that in mind if you choose to play in your browser)
